entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 6:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
